text: This is a wonderful product . Not only did I get a clean ( bacteria-free ) tongue , but fresh breath also ! It definitely works well in conjunction with the tongue scraper . I know it does not sound like something you would want to do , but once you do , you will love it !
this is not music , it is a guy growling , blast beats , and simple guitars . there s no atmosphere at all . it is just mind-blowing noise .
